description: {"blocks":[{"key":"apf9m","text":"This protocol is for Clear, Unobstructed Brain/Body Imaging Cocktails and Computational analysis (CUBIC) of mouse lung tissue for whole lobe imaging using Zeiss Lightsheet Imaging. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"742f5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5ugo","text":"All experimental procedures were performed in the American Association for Accreditation of Laboratory Animal Care (AAALAC)-certified laboratory animal facility at the University of California San Diego, following protocols approved by the institutional animal care and use committee (IACUC). The procedures should incorporate all local requirements for standards of animal experimentation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"em3ff","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5o030","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4dre8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ijg1","text":"Euthanize mice by CO2 inhalation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":20,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4so8k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7dmkd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ed1g3","text":"To clear blood from the lungs perfuse transcardially the animals with 1xPBS. Gravity inflate lungs with 4% paraformaldehyde (PFA) and fix overnight at   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":151,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"784C2140522711ECA43B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"93kgi","text":"Wash the lungs at least 3x for 10 minutes with 1xPBS rotating at   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2BB11DC0522811ECB92037ACC0D50D6F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2i5eu","text":"Separate lobes to image them individually after cleaning.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d7t2r","text":"Rotate the lungs at   in CUBIC R1 buffer for at least 1 week.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7eb8a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"138ao","text":"Multiple lung lobes can be cleared in a   tube filled with R1 buffer.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7ha76","text":"If the buffer starts turning yellow or green add a fresh buffer to the sample.  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3f15","text":"Clearing can be done at    but will take longer.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2gnu1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7bhnd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"166B3402522C11ECA43B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"166B327E522C11ECA43B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"166B335F522C11ECA43B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":21,"offset":43}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":64,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"c0ovf","text":"Clearing procedures were done according to Susaki et al., (2015)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"B8B08410522B11ECB92037ACC0D50D6F","url":"https://doi.org/10.1038/nprot.2015.085"},"mutability":"","type":"link"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"do2gd","text":"After 1 week move samples to   room to continue clearing until you are ready for imaging or to store the samples in CUBIC R1 buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"41mfd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9BED26F0522911ECB92037ACC0D50D6F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aj7jv","text":"Mix    of Urea (Sigma-Aldrich) and   H2O in a glass beaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":38,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dqorj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"125","error":false,"guid":"A2CEA3A0522D11ECB92037ACC0D50D6F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"175","error":false,"guid":"4F7E8E30522E11ECB92037ACC0D50D6F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4h45f","text":"Stir on a hot plate over low heat or place in a water bath, up to   , until the urea dissolves.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f0eie","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7kbfo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ibdf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"75EECBC0522E11ECB92037ACC0D50D6F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"56","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bbi7c","text":"Allowing the mixture to reach a temperature of up to 56 degrees, will facilitate","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":27,"offset":41,"style":"italic"}],"key":"4mcel","text":"other components going into solution, but this step is not necessary.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"627cr","text":"Add    (or   ) of Quadrol (Sigma-Aldrich).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6h0sf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3q4pk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d2v58","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"123","error":false,"guid":"AFFBF0E0522E11ECB92037ACC0D50D6F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"124","error":false,"guid":"C440B130522E11ECB92037ACC0D50D6F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":152}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"nlui","text":"Quadrol is very viscous, therefore, it should be weighed directly into the urea solution. If the volume must be measured by volume, heat the Quadrol to   in a water bath prior to pouring.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"64658C80522F11ECB92037ACC0D50D6F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"56","unit":10},"mutability":"","type":"temperature"}}}}}}

BP151-500).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7hn4a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"70","error":false,"guid":"A69361E0522F11ECB92037ACC0D50D6F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dk8ed","text":"Remove from heat and stir until dissolved.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2e7up","text":"Store the solution sealed at   for approximately 1 month.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":57}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2jggh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"biimo","text":"When the solution takes on a strong ammonia smell, it has expired.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":66}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cks8m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4mgmo","text":"If the temperature is too high when making the solution, the ammonia smell will be immediately present, and the solution should be discarded.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":141}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9o1u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2EA5ED19523111ECA43B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bjalj","text":"Turn off heat and add   of Triethanolamine (TEA) with stirring.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5uf1t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"44.5","error":false,"guid":"2635EA00523311ECB92037ACC0D50D6F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"sbf1","text":"Add   of TritonX-100 until well mixed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7959u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"380","error":false,"guid":"B0A5D330523311ECB92037ACC0D50D6F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9u5r2","text":"Store the solution sealed at   for approximately 1 month.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":57}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1aahe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1c8om","text":"When the solution takes on a strong ammonia smell, it has expired.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":66}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cv96","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmagd","text":"If the temperature is too high when making the solution, the ammonia smell will be immediately present, and the solution should be discarded.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":141}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"01D7383F523411ECA43B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bjnl","text":"One day before imaging:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1gso7","text":"Embed cleared lung sample in 3% low melt agarose.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3uj3t","text":"Once the agarose block has hardened, trim the block as small as possible for imaging. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"992cf","text":"If needed, attach staples with superglue for suspending in light sheet chamber.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epg16","text":"Store the agarose block with staples attached in R2 buffer overnight so that the agarose meets the refractive index of the CUBIC R2 buffer by the time of imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ck7h8","text":"Imaging was done with Zeiss Z.1 Lightsheet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7vhqe","text":"Fill light sheet chamber with CUBIC R2 buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d69f2","text":"Suspend the sample by attaching a magnet to the sample holder and using the magnet to hold the staples and agarose block.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":61,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"83ups","text":"To get the largest view of the sample, use a 2.5x objective with a large imaging chamber (Translucence Biosystems, Mesoscale Imaging System).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2biv6","text":"For long term storage place the sample back in the CUBIC R1 buffer. Do not leave the sample in the CUBIC R2 buffer for a long time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Protocol for CUBIC Clearing and Whole Mount Imaging of Mouse Lung Lobes
